title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. VI, pt. 201 - Cemetery Operations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. VI, pt. 201 - Cemetery Operations

State Regulations
§ 201.1 - Offer of resale of cemetery lots to cemetery corporations
§ 201.2 - Sale of lots or graves purchased prior to September 1, 1949 for purpose of resale
§ 201.3 - Burial in a path or walk
§ 201.4 - Foreign cemetery corporations
§ 201.5 - Repealed
§ 201.6 - Sale of outer containers
§ 201.7 - Posting of sign at cemetery
§ 201.8 - Availability for interment on six-day basis
§ 201.9 - Maintenance of maps and directional signs
§ 201.10 - Community or public mausoleums and columbariums
§ 201.11 - Procedure for approval for construction of a mausoleum
§ 201.12 - Holiday burials
§ 201.13 - Liquidation of burial societies within an incorporated cemetery
§ 201.14 - Repair or notice as to nondangerous damage or defacement
§ 201.15 - Authorization to inter
§ 201.16 - Cemetery renovation
§ 201.17 - Lawn crypts
§ 201.18 - Management services contracts
§ 201.19 - Disposition of Cremains at Pet Cemeteries
§ 201.20 - Permanent maintenance fund collections and contributions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. VI, pt. 201

Statutory authority: Not-for-Profit Corporation Law, §
1504[c]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
